long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of your favorite web novels across the devices. This is a refactored version of previous `Web NOvel Traker` extension with additional customizable regular expression rules to identifying novel chapters

Usage: 
   Go to the title page of the novel.
   Open Web Novel Tracker and press `Add Bookmark` button. novel will be added to the library
   Extension will keep track of the last read chapter for you
   You can export booklist via export button and import booklist via extension options


Enjoy Reading
